text: 2|267|satyaviśvāsikaḷē, niṅṅaḷ sampādiccuṇṭākkiya nalla vastukkaḷil ninnuṁ, bhūmiyil ninn niṅṅaḷkk nāṁ ulpādippicc tannatil ninnuṁ niṅṅaḷ celavaḻikkuvin. kaṇṇaṭaccukeāṇṭallāte niṅṅaḷ svīkarikkātta mēāśamāya sādhanaṅṅaḷ (dānadharm'maṅṅaḷil) celavaḻikkuvānāyi karuti vekkarut‌. allāhu āruṭeyuṁ āśrayamillāttavanuṁ stutyarhanumāṇenn niṅṅaḷ aṟiññu keāḷḷuka
